title: Can we just appreciate the detail in the Blood Moon Splash Arts?
body:
Blood Moon Diana:

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iy7-i4r2G_k/WIe2ZJsFsKI/AAAAAAAAco4/3Busi46UyPAuqVXc46V3nN443o04My-zQCLcB/s640/Diana_Splash_11.jpg

Blood Moon Jhin:

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aTf8xfP1coo/WIut9QqMvYI/AAAAAAAAc7g/XQYCLx96ldEtaB6ncpEs6Eyrl6bXlAaYgCLcB/s640/Jhin_Splash_2.jpg

Blood Moon Talon:

https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FBavEo6oLws/WI-rbD3Q35I/AAAAAAAAdBw/q6Nmu60tqXkfzY6ZKhAtVdNC-3MIq9HzQCLcB/s640/Talon_Splash_5.jpg

Blood Moon Twisted Fate:

https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Wy9vHnb7aK4/WIe2gLUsdEI/AAAAAAAAcpA/3KXp4rWE-54zLgahUwfPFHPu-GoJZ2v0ACLcB/s640/TwistedFate_Splash_10.jpg

Don't tell me I'm the only one who thinks these splash arts looks awesome and are possibly the best splash arts so far, anyone else with me on this one?

replies.body: Omg I love all of these splashes and they have actually made me want to try the champions themselves. Well done riot üëç
